description: This file defines the StudentProvider class, a state management class using ChangeNotifier for handling student data within a Flutter application. It provides methods to load, add, update, delete, and retrieve students, interfacing with a database service and notifying UI components of changes.

classes.name: StudentProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class managing student data, including loading, adding, updating, deleting students, and handling loading/error states in a Flutter app.

methods.name: loadStudents
methods.description: Fetches student data from the database and updates the internal list, handling loading and error states.

methods.name: addStudent
methods.description: Adds a new student to the database and updates local state, notifying listeners.

methods.name: updateStudent
methods.description: Updates an existing student's data both in the database and in local state, then notifies listeners.

methods.name: deleteStudent
methods.description: Deletes a student by ID from the database and removes from local list, then notifies listeners.

methods.name: getStudentsByClass
methods.description: Returns a list of students belonging to a specific class.

methods.name: getStudentById
methods.description: Retrieves a student by their ID from the local list.

methods.name: _setLoading
methods.description: Sets the loading state and schedules notifyListeners calls appropriately.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Cleans up resources when provider is no longer needed.

methods.name: clearError
methods.description: Resets the error state and notifies listeners.
